snippet.title: Little Reaper Coming Soon Trailer
snippet.description:
Slash, dash and reap your way through the mystical realm of Little Reaper as Ollie, the Grim Reaper’s tiny assistant in this colorful adventure platformer game.
Ollie has been left in charge of Death’s Mansion while Grim has gone on a well-deserved holiday. Unfortunately, clumsy Ollie accidentally shatters a jar containing a vast, and important, collection of souls. 
Help Ollie traverse the lands of Death’s Domain and collect all the souls he let loose, or else he will suffer the wrath of Death. Or maybe worse… get fired!

Coming soon to Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/428170/Little_Reaper/

http://www.littlereapergames.com

https://www.facebook.com/littlereapergames/
https://twitter.com/Lilreapergames
